comments:
Release 20020205 
This morning I started eclipse and received an error message instead of the 
package view for one of my Java perspectives.  Closing and reopening the 
package view in the perspective resolved the problem. After saving the log 
file, I stopped and restarted eclipse.  The package view came up normally. I 
reselected each of the editor tabs to try to get the navigator back into the 
same state as before, stopped and restarted eclipse and still could not 
recreate the problem.  I have turned of Window/Decorators/Launch configuration 
decorators because they had caused a similar problem for me when I first 
started using the 20020205 build.  I have verified that they are still turned 
off.
The following is the entry from the log file associated with the problem.
